Name: Naughty Girl
About the game: You meet a beautiful young woman in a nice modern flat. She is excited and asks you to love her. She requests constantly new and exciting love positions, and you have 24 different positions to choose from. She asks for new positions by sending short messages on the screen, and you have to find the right one, which fits to the wish of the woman. If you select the right position in twenty seconds the woman gets more and more excited. Be careful, if your selection is not the right one, the woman will not be satisfied and her mood and excitement will go bad in a minute. But if your fantasy and experience is rich enough, she will enjoy your company and will tell you how much she loves you. In the game you can see 24 different positions grouped around 9 different love themes with detailed 3D graphics and freely adjustable animation speed.
